description: Being able to reliably start a fire is always pleasant and sometimes essential. This combination of a rugged container and fiercely burning matches ensures you won’t be caught out in the cold. A great addition to any emergency kit.Contains 25 stormproof matches.Screw-on cap is waterproofed with an O-ring.Striking surface outside. Two additional striking surfaces are protected inside the case.Match burn for 15 seconds and will relight even after several seconds of complete submersion.Extra-long, 7cm matchsticks protect fingers against burns.Dimensions are 2.9 x 7.6cm.
name: UCO Stormproof Match Kit
